apps.name: Google Sheets
apps.description: Create, edit, and share spreadsheets wherever you are with Google Sheets, and get automated insights from your data.

apps.name: Gmail
apps.description: One of the most popular email services, Gmail keeps track of all your emails with threaded conversations, tags, and Google-powered search to find any message you need.

apps.name: Slack
apps.description: Slack is a platform for team communication: everything in one place, instantly searchable, available wherever you go. Offering instant messaging, document sharing and knowledge search for modern teams.

apps.name: Google Calendar
apps.description: Google Calendar lets you organize your schedule and share events with co-workers and friends. With Google's free online calendar, it's easy to keep track of your daily schedule.

apps.name: Google Drive
apps.description: Google Drive is Google's file sync app that lets you store all of your files online alongside your Google Docs documents, and keep them synced with all of your devices.

apps.name: Notion
apps.description: A new tool that blends your everyday work apps into one. It's the all-in-one workspace for you and your team.

apps.name: HubSpot
apps.description: HubSpot is your all-in-one stop for all of your marketing software needs.

apps.name: Google Forms
apps.description: Google Forms is an easy way to collect data from the web with a simple UI and powerful editor. Works hand-in-hand with Google Sheets!

apps.name: Facebook Lead Ads
apps.description: Facebook lead ads make signing up for business information easy for people and more valuable for businesses. The Facebook lead ad app is useful for marketers who want to automate actions on their leads.

apps.name: Mailchimp
apps.description: Mailchimp is an email and marketing automation platform built for growing businesses. Turn email and SMS into revenue.

apps.name: Stripe
apps.description: Stripe is a developer-friendly way to accept payments online and in mobile apps. Stripe's suite of APIs powers commerce for thousands of companies of all sizes, processing billions of dollars for businesses each year.

apps.name: Microsoft Outlook
apps.description: Microsoft Outlook is a web-based suite of webmail, contacts, tasks, and calendaring services.

apps.name: Typeform
apps.description: Typeform helps you ask awesomely online! If you ever need to run a survey, questionnaire, form, contest etc. Typeform will help you achieve it beautifully across all devices, every time, using its next generation platform.

apps.name: Airtable
apps.description: Organize anything with Airtable, a modern database created for everyone. Airtable is a fast and flexible way to create tables to keep track of anything, from sales leads to vacation planning to inventory management.

apps.name: Calendly
apps.description: Calendly is an elegant and simple scheduling tool for businesses that eliminates email back and forth. It helps save time so that businesses can provide great service and increase sales.

apps.name: LeadConnector
apps.description: LeadConnector is a platform for marketing agencies to manage marketing automation to customer communications and beyond.

apps.name: ChatGPT (OpenAI)
apps.description: ChatGPT is an AI tool built by OpenAI that enables conversational automation.

apps.name: Trello
apps.description: Trello is a team collaboration tool that lets you organize anything and everything to keep your projects on task.

apps.name: Google Docs
apps.description:
Google Docs is an online word processor that lets you create and format text documents. Collaboratively edit documents with other people in real time.

We also support Google Sheets!

apps.name: Discord
apps.description: Discord is an all-in-one voice and text chat for gamers.

apps.name: Salesforce
apps.description: Salesforce is a leading enterprise customer relationship manager (CRM) application.

apps.name: Webflow
apps.description: Design and build professional websites with a CMS from scratch online with Webflow.

featuredApp.name: Zapier Forms
featuredApp.description: Zapier Forms is an automated way to collect data and integrate your form with workflows that can connect to 8,000+ apps.

DoMoreSection.description: Automate smarter with {appName} and scale with confidence. Zapier is built for enterprise-grade security, compliance, and performance.

TriggerActionListSection.title: Supported triggers and actions
TriggerActionListSection.subtitle: Zapier helps you create workflows that connect your apps to automate repetitive tasks. A trigger is an event that starts a workflow, and an action is an event a Zap performs.

JoinMillionsCTA.heading: Join millions worldwide who automate their work using Zapier

NotSupportedSection.description: {appName} has not yet built an integration on Zapier.
NotSupportedSection.callout-1: Connect {appName} - Even without an official integration!
NotSupportedSection.additional-description: While {appName} hasn't partnered with Zapier yet, you can still automate your workflows and connect it with thousands of other apps using Zapier's flexible tools.
NotSupportedSection.setup-description: With a bit of setup, you can build powerful integrations using:

AdditionalLinks.requestAppTooltip: Don't see a web app you need? We're constantly adding new ones to Zapier based on customer requests.

AdditionalLinks.addAppTooltip: Add an app to Zapier yourself! Our developer platform lets you create triggers and actions people can use to automate and integrate your app with hundreds of others.
